name: Appendix perf tests
body:
# Online Appendix "An Exploratory Study of the State of Practice of Performance Testing in Java-Based Open Source Projects"

Here we collect some raw data and additional material to the paper _"An Exploratory Study of the State of Practice of Performance Testing in Java-Based Open Source Projects"_, by Philipp Leitner and Cor-Paul Bezemer. All data can be accessed by cloning this repository.

## Data Gathering and Analysis Scripts
All scripts used to collect the data and produce the metrics discussed in the paper (plus some that are not in the paper) are in the folder `scripts`.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
